text: "I've Been Losing You" is a 1986 song by Norwegian band A-ha and is the lead single from their second studio album Scoundrel Days. It topped the single charts in Denmark and Norway and made the top 10 in Ireland, Italy and the United Kingdom. The music video was shot at the Universal Amphitheatre in Los Angeles. Category:1986 songs Category:A-ha songs
title: I've Been Losing You
